actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the William Jennings Bryan National Memorial.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to purchase from the city of Salem, Illinois, the Bryan-Bennett Library and the birthplace of William Jennings Bryan for its use and development as the "William Jennings Bryan National Memorial". Permits the National Park Service to maintain the memorial.

titles.title: A bill to establish the William Jennings Bryan National Memorial.
